mapper.insert: insert into product_category (category_Id, parent_Id, cname, sort, has_leaf, category_status, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, category_key) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hasLeaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update product_category set parent_Id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, has_leaf = #{hasLeaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_status = #{categoryStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_Id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_key = #{categoryKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where category_Id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select p.category_Id, p.parent_Id, p.cname, p.sort, p.has_leaf, p.category_status, p.description, p.create_date, p.create_user_Id, p.create_user_name, p.modify_date, p.modify_user_Id, p.modify_user_name, pa.cname as parent_name from product_category p, product_category pa where p.parent_Id = pa.category_Id and p.category_Id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select category_Id, parent_Id, cname, sort, has_leaf, category_status, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, category_key from product_category

SELECT category_Id, parent_Id, cname, sort, has_leaf, category_status, description, category_key, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name FROM product_category WHERE parent_Id="" OR parent_Id IS NULL

SELECT category_Id, parent_Id, cname, sort, has_leaf, category_status, description, category_key, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name FROM product_category WHERE category_key = "CarService" and (parent_Id="" OR parent_Id IS NULL)

SELECT category_Id, parent_Id, cname, sort, has_leaf, category_status, description, category_key, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name FROM product_category WHERE (category_key != "CarService" OR category_key IS NULL) and (parent_Id="" OR parent_Id IS NULL)

SELECT category_Id, parent_Id, cname, sort, has_leaf, category_status, description, category_key, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name FROM product_category WHERE has_leaf=1

select category_Id, parent_Id, cname, sort, has_leaf, category_status, description, category_key, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name from product_category where parent_Id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by sort desc

select count(0) from product_category where 1 = 1
and cname like CONCAT('%', #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pc.category_Id, pc.parent_Id, pc.cname, pc.category_key, pc.sort, pc.has_leaf, pc.category_status, pc.description, pc.create_date, pc.create_user_Id, pc.create_user_name, pc.modify_date, pc.modify_user_Id, pc.modify_user_name, ppc.cname AS parent_name FROM product_category pc, product_category ppc where pc.parent_Id = ppc.category_Id
and pc.cname like CONCAT('%', #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by pc.create_date desc
LIMIT #{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
